title: At the borders of the future. [No. 70/17] = Aux frontieres de l'avenir
creator_credit: Office de Documentation par Film and Nicolas Skrotsky
brief_description: Cinemagazine items including: 1. Better building - to build better and cheaper accommodation new techniques are being used but care must be taken to maintain quality. 2. The solar observatory. 3. The artificial kidney - Professor Jungers speaks about the importance of a dialyser or artificial kidney.
